TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in the village of LOC of LOC of the PERSON - on - Don Region . The respondent Government are represented by PERSON , ORG at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE the applicant lodged a civil action against ORG ( hereafter DATE the Service ) , seeking payment of pension arrears and increase of his DATE pension .

On DATE ORG of GPE awarded the applicant MONEY ( ORG , MONEY ) in pension arrears , and DATE payments of CARDINAL RUR ( MONEY ) . The court also held that the applicant ’s DATE pension was to be adjusted in line with the minimum DATE wage .
On DATE the PERSON - on - Don Regional Court upheld the judgment .
Enforcement proceedings were instituted on DATE . However , the ORG continued to underpay the applicant DATE pension .
At the time the application was communicated , the applicant claimed that the judgment of DATE remained unenforced .
According to the Government , on DATE ORG credited RUR CARDINAL,CARDINAL to the applicant ’s account . Since DATE the applicant has received DATE pension of ORG .
